title: After AH/R&R tenements are handed over free of cost to MCGM, Occupation Certificate for sale portion shall be given
clause_text: After AH/R&R tenements are handed over free of cost to MCGM, Occupation Certificate for sale portion shall be given.
section: Development of AH/R&Ron private plot or plot of authority other than Govt./MCGM/Appropriate Authority.

source_pdf.text_snippet: After AH/R&R tenements are handed over free of cost to MCGM, Occupation Certificate for sale portion shall be given.
